summary: MY HONDA CIVIC HAD AN AIR BAG RECALL, WHICH I TOOK THE CAR IN FOR.    ABOUT 2 MONTHS AFTER THE FIX, MY AIR BAG LIGHT CAME ON.  I HAD IT CHECKED OUT AT ANOTHER SHOP AND THEY RESET MY LIGHT.  IT COME BACK ON APPROXIMATELY EVERY MONTH.  IT SEEMS TO ME THAT IT IS SUSPICIOUS THAT I NEVER HAD ANY SUCH PROBLEM UNTIL THE HONDA DEALER REPLACED THE AIR BAG.  THEY REFUSE TO ADDRESS THE PROBLEM AND INSIST IT IS NOT THERE RESPONSIBILITY.  COINCIDENCE I DON'T THINK SO. I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW IF THIS IS AN ONGOING ISSUED WITH OTHER HONDA OWNERS WHO HAVE UNDERGONE THIS PROCEDURE
